foodItems.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
foodItems.description: Tender chicken marinated in spices, cooked in a creamy tomato sauce.

foodItems.name: Margherita Pizza
foodItems.description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves.

foodItems.name: Sushi Platter
foodItems.description: Assorted selection of fresh sushi rolls including salmon, tuna, and California rolls.

foodItems.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
foodItems.description: Spaghetti pasta served with a rich beef and tomato sauce, garnished with Parmesan cheese.

foodItems.name: Caesar Salad
foodItems.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

foodItems.name: Pad Thai
foodItems.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and peanuts in a tangy tamarind sauce.

foodItems.name: Beef Burger
foodItems.description: Juicy beef patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and cheese, served in a toasted bun.

foodItems.name: Chocolate Brownie
foodItems.description: Decadent chocolate brownie served warm with vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.

foodItems.name: Fish and Chips
foodItems.description: Crispy battered fish served with thick-cut fries, mushy peas, and tartar sauce.

foodItems.name: Pho
foodItems.description: Vietnamese noodle soup with beef or chicken, garnished with fresh herbs, bean sprouts, and lime wedges.
